content.detailedDescription:
Early morning on march 25th, i was driving my mother from tucson, az to phoenix, az, to the airport. it was a beautiful clear morning, around 7:30 am. we were talking most of the way. about a half hour outside of phoenix, something caught my eye to the east of me. two dark objects were in the sky fairly close to each other. at first i thought they were just hanging in the sky. i pointed them out to my mother and we watched them until we could no longer see them. at first they were a few hundred feet apart. then they started coming closer together. kind of floating down together, but sort of straight down. very slowly. like they were floating down. they were definitely round, but not flat. no dome on the top, more like a slightly smaller round than the rest. dark color, no shininess at all. 
i was travelling on i-10 and looking to the east. there were some structures out there, maybe a tiny little village. i don't really know what's out there. a lot of empty land as well. flat. 
we did not see them land, but we assumed they did.
we were quite far from this area, but the objects seemed big, so they must have been much larger up close. 
i really have no idea what they were! they could have been a new design of a blimp?? lol. 
but, both my mother and i were a little unnerved as we see a lot of hot air balloons, blimps, etc... in arizona!
content.summary: Two dark round discs descending together

content.detailedDescription: I was closing my dresser near my window. when i made my way back to the front of my bed i noticed out the window a diamond shape lights in the sky. the lights were changing colors from red to white to light blue, and green. i woke my wife up and asked her what do you think that is? she said a helicopter. i said it was to high up to be a helicopter. as soon as i said that a helicopter flew by and she could tell it was way higher than the helicopter. i asked her to get her dad's binoculars. through the binoculars i could see a dark object with a small white light then a big white light in middle and another small white light on end. on the other side of the object you could see multiple lights changing colors like it was the exhaust from engine. my wife, son, and father in law saw the same thing and could not be leave what the were seeing. i notice the object at 1215 am and was still there when i went to sleep at 1 am. when we got up at 6 am the object was gone.
content.summary: Was dark object with two small white lights on ends and a big white light in middle and behind it was glowing lights that changed from white,green, light blue, and red.

content.detailedDescription:
My sister and i were renting an apartment and this night my boyfriend at the time spent the night. we laid down to go to sleep facing away from window when all of a sudden our whole room fills up with this bright blue light. we immediately get up and look out the window. my sister comes running in asking if we see it too then sees that our room is obviously in view of  this orb. we all stand in awe as this orb hovers then goes behind and around the chimney of the building across from us, up and down, hovering every now. i grabbed my phone and started video taping it. we all seemed in awe watching it and couldn't get away from the window. it all of a sudden just disappears, a little freaked out but go to bed fine. at this time my phone is fine and acting normal, even watched the footage that night again to see if it filmed good, which it did. the next day i see i'm not the only one that seen the lights in middletown from facebook. phone works for one more time to show someone then when i get it out the next time to show someone its black, not working anymore. had to get a new phone and lost my footage. 

a family member said it was just heat lightning but i'm not sure if i can believe that.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Blue orb hovered over building, going around chimney and then behind and in front of building.

content.detailedDescription:
I am fascinated with ufo's, so one day i decided to go outside at night and look at the stars. i was in gary indiana, it was summer and hot. i set on a plat form outside until the mosquitoes started getting to me. so i asked my sister for the keys to her car and she gave them to me. i then got behind the driver seat, because to my right was a big tree i couldn't see over it in the car but i could see behind me, in front of me, and to my left. i played games on my phone so i wouldn't look crazy just sitting in the car looking up but i kept looking up. after about and hour i got bored lit a cigarette and opened the car door. i had stop playing my phone because i wanted too spot the mosquitoes i didn't want them in the car when i shut the door, but close to the end of my cigarette i saw a shadow move in front of me then back quickly. i looked up
quickly and saw this triangular, disc like, unrealistic black type of material, with one red light, one green light, and a blue light one for each edge of the ship. as soon as i saw it i instantly got terrified for no reason though. i looked at it and then i panic and backed back into the car quickly hoping it didn't see me praying to myself like please god don't let it take me. all of a sudden i got calm because i wanted to see it that's why i was out there but when i got out the car it was down the road by the railroad tracks i looked at hoping it comes back but also hoping i don't get scared then it started flying away from slow to so fast i couldn't see it. and i remember going back in the house walking back and forth trying to figure out what happened and what it was and how it did all that stuff and we're it came from and what did it want and did it
take me and will it come back. so my sister told me to calm down its not real even if it is just forget it ever happened took her keys and went in the room. which i did but a couple nights later i had
a dream that brought me here. i had a dream that when i backed back into the car i was lifted in the air by this strange energy that felt like had me and i could get away but it didn't hurt but before i knew that i was screaming but it was like it was for no reason because no one did anything no one came out or nothing that's when i noticed it didn't hurt so i calmed down i don't know how long it took me to get up in the ship but i remember being ok on the ship but they were doing something to me i don't know what or who i felt sedated and whined up opening my eyes quickly remembering were i was and hearing them say something but because i knew i was out numbered out smarted and weak at the time i felt like my best bet was to treat them like friends an pray for her best so i asked them to fix my back i have (sluklyosous)[sorry i can't spell it hope you can pronounce it] and one of them told me he wouldn't and to kill me i might have been woke the whole time and then i woke up. i am telling you this because i fill like i know something i shouldn't. something that is smart and complex but
also simple. and doesn't belong in the wrong hands and i don't know who to talk to about it?
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Scary short weird surprising unbelievable amazing new mind bottling and a mind opener

content.detailedDescription: I went to work at 7 am, i was walking from one work area to another. i decided to take a pic of the sunrise .I took 2. and after examining them i noticed a shining object in my pic, it was in both pics.  the first pic looks like the object is decloaking. in the second pic you can fully see the object, but it is higher in the sky. i didn't notice the object in my pic til later that day.
content.summary: I was taking pics of the morning sunrise and i saw this object in my pics

content.detailedDescription: I was driving westbound on interstate 435 and noticed 3 triangles floating from south to north.They were not all in the same line. seems like the middle one was a little higher. they were transparent but you could see through them like a reflection in rippling water. i did see something that day and have not seen anything since. i was watching the history channel and hangar 1 was on so i thought i would let you know. i remember it was around 1989. not much sooner or later. it was and is still hard to explain. it would have been easy to not see.
content.summary: Driving west on hiway and seen transparent/cloaking triangles floating north

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling on business on hwy 35, coming out of gaylesville, headed to ft. payne
, al, when i suddenly noticed above the treetops, a speeding object.  it appeared at about the height that you would normally see a local  small aircraft, piper, cherokee, etc., but was very clearly not a plane or chopper.  it was actually flying over a large open pasture.  it seemed to be a solid white or shiny silver object, pod or egg shaped.  it had no projecting shapes, wings, rudders, etc.  no visible lights.  i'm certain it was fairly low,  500-1000 ft. because there was low cloud cover,  and as it sped north, it became hidden by the low clouds.  i watched for it the rest of the afternoon, hoping to get another glimpse of it.   i was so tempted to go to the nearby airport in ft. payne to see if they had received report of any such sighting by anyone else.   i  was 55 yrs old at the time and have been an avid aircraft enthusiast  most of my life and am very familiar with all sorts of craft, civilian and military and am certain this was something i'd never seen before.  i was so impressed by the speed and the silence with which it flew at such a low altitude.  i will never forget that sight.     i researched ufo sightings for months afterwards and was relieved? to see some photos of similar sightings from around the world.  i especially was looking for a report of sightings  anywhere near that same area.  i found only one report of a night time sighting of some lights, which  did not sound particularly unusual by the description.  i actually made a report to another ufo group a few months afterwards. 'don't recall their name.  i later actually created my own video simulation in a computer software, just to have my own record of the image and i guess trying to relive the moment.
content.summary: Witnessed a white pod-shaped craft speeding silently  in a s to n direction.   low altitude, very fast.

content.detailedDescription: I was at work at the time of the sighting, on a smoke break, the event was also witnessed by my foreman. the moon was visible during the day, i looked up at the moon and noticed two small orbs circling erratically, and then noticed four in the same general area. i pointed out the orbs to my foreman, after a few seconds he finally saw the objects. all were circling wildly and appeared white and metallic as they caught the sun's rays. i said "what the hell are those?", after a minute or two he replied "they're birds." my reply to that was "no way", i estimate the altitude at 30,000 to 35,000 feet high i said "those aren't birds that high", he said "they are high i'll give you that." i returned to the mill to get another witness and when we returned the objects were gone. but in their place was a large, grey, oblong shaped object. the second witness said do you mean that jet, i said that's no jet and looked at the second witness, when we looked back it was gone, there was no condensation trail in the sky from a jet i said explain that, he replied i don't know what it was.
content.summary: Circling orbs at high altitude

content.detailedDescription: It was my eighth  grade year. i was getting home from pizza hut around 1 am. my friends mom was taking me home. it was raining but had stopped but the lighting was still there. on my way home i noticed that the animals in my neighborhood were acting strange, they usually are hyper and moving around but majority of them were distracted by something.  as we were driving up my drive way my friends mom had asked us if we can see that. my friend and i were looking around through the windows but nothing was to be seen. as we got closer to my house she was convinced it was a ufo. we stopped the car in front of my house, my friend and i got out of the vehicle and it was then that we saw this triangular figure with lights on the bottom corners of each side, hovering over my parents room of their house. it's lights were extremely bright and white. i had my phone in my hand, i don;t know why it didn't click to me to use it and record the event. i was in shock. i felt like i was being controlled not to do anything. after i snapped out of that state i ran to my front door, yelling for my family to open the door. by the time they opened it, we all went back outside and the object had moved behind a cloud where the lighting was and remained hovering there. it then started moving directions at high speeds. and then zoomed out of sight.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Triangular ufo hovering over my parents room of their house. object was really quiet but fast.

content.detailedDescription: My husband was station in fort riley kansas and at the time we lived off post in junction city. i went outside for air when i notice some lights ascending as if took off from the post air field traveling southeast. there were  five lights in the shape of triangle. the lights seem to be on the lining around this object but i could not see the center of the object. the lights were apparent but center seem to be almost transparent. it was in my view for a little over a minute until i could no longer view it over the trees. my husband pulled up minutes afterwards and i was so freaked out and didn't want him to leave for work the next day. my husband explain that could have been night military drills but i knew that it was not military. at the time i was in disbelief with what i had witness and was told not to discuss this with anyone by a family that was also military. i now know that lights were reported in phoenix on the same night but not in kansas.
content.summary: As my husband was station in fort riley, kansas one night while going out for the air i notice 5 lights in the shape of a triangle. there was no sound it just hovered then took off heading southeast until out of my view.

content.detailedDescription:
It was september  1980 in the  afternoon me and 3 frind where on the sea  in  zodiac boat  going  for a week  hunting on  anticosti  island
clear  day  light  wind as we go  i  spoted a ball shape object  look  like polish  all succer ball 
it  came out  from the  top  of teh island roling  in the  wind regular  roling  flying  straight  out  to  sea it  whent  for  about  2 to  3 mile  over the sea then  stop  but  kept  roling after  few min  it  reverse and whent  back  to  the  island i  figure  his diameter  around 50  to  60  i  take  the  hight  0f the  tree on  top  of the  cliff as a gage also  as it  came  out  at  first  if it  would have been floating  on  air  curent  coming  over  the  edge  ov the  cliff it  would have come  down a litle  but  it  was  a straight  line perfect  level  flight 
no  window  i  couldnt  see none no  structure  coming  out  perfect  succer ball with  the  similar patern
content.summary: Came out  over the sea fron the  island flew to  about  2 mile  out  to  sea stop then came back  over the island

content.detailedDescription:
2006 10:30-11 pm longmont co sunnyvale condos, (warm night with a half moon and light clouds)
i cannot remember the date , but i know it was a warmer, only a few clouds in the sky and the moon was almost a half moon  that night in 2006 about 10:30 or 11 pm ( my sister’s boy friend was mad because he was trying to sleep when i went in to call my sister and when we ran through the house to get a look from out front) i went to the balcony to smoke a cigarette , and noticed what appeared to be an air plane in the distance, but it looked different, i went inside and asked my sister to come out and help me decide if it was or not, she noticed the lights were too far apart to be a plane , then i noticed it was too low, and getting bigger as it got closer, we noticed it was huge!!! at least the size a football fields set up long ways i could not figure out the thickness, it seemed like a sheet across the sky, on the left end was a blue light and on the right was an orange light, we watched the object slowly move from the size of a plane in the distance to the large size move over our apartment and we went out the front door to see it as it moved passed our roof out of sight so we could continue to watch, it was about 15 minutes before we saw a green light flicker on towards the right side then all of the lights quickly went out and the object moved  out of sight as it left we could see the moon and clouds reappear in the sky. (i very distinctly remember the fact that as it passed over us, it was blocking the night sky’s normal features, moon, stars, light clouds etc.  looking closely it appeared to have a reddish brown color) i’ve waited so long to tell this experience because i could not find any other witnesses and was afraid to be criticized but now i’m reaching out because i think this is important and want my experience to be recorded in defense of this type of experience ( p.S.  my sister went to bed after we decided the event was over… about ten minutes later her boyfriend slammed around the house and came in to my room and said” where is she?!” i replied, “my sister?” and he said “duh where did she go???” i replied, “she went to bed about ten minutes ago”, he went back to the room and she was on the floor next to the bed in a disoriented state, he asked her where she was and she replied, “here in bed”, but she was on the floor and did not know she was on the floor…?)
content.summary: Huge, low ,three lights ,slow moving, appeared flat, 2006, more then fifteen minutes, possible abduction

content.detailedDescription: Friday night family and i saw and i'm just over san diego county approximately 10 o'clock at night. first seem like a really bright star but then we noticed it was flashing. within a half an hour a helicopter came over our location towards please lighting object in the sky. after that we found another four similar objects. it was in the same spot for several hours we finally went to bed.Just for the record my husband got his binoculars so we could all get a better look. at first it was flashing lights and then the light came to be streaming all over like in a crazy pattern
content.summary: We first saw really bright looking star that seem to be flashing husband got his binoculars so we could get a closer look. it stayed in the same spot for at least 2, however i think it was a military helicopter because there was no noise coming from

content.detailedDescription: I was with a group of people who were in a rural area parked & talking. it was a pasture. the object came over the tree line in a streak. traveling faster than anything i've ever seen. it stopped directly over us fora second or less. it was scary. it then streaked away. one other person in the group and i looked at each other and said in unison, "did you see that". no one believed us. i quit talking about it because i have been called crazy too many times. i'm a christian and i 'swear to god" i saw it. the other person saw same thing i did. the newspaper reported other sightings as well. i can describe in greater detail. i have been ridiculed too many times to talk to a skeptic again. i am willing to describe in greater detail if anyone is honestly interested. it happened. nothing is shaped like that. nothing can travel that fast. it was absolutely silent.
content.summary: Dome with lights. lights were in center around structure

content.detailedDescription:
My friend works with a person who has an awesome telescope and we were going to look at venus because it was the right alignment.  his friend owns a christmas tree farm so it was prime opportunity with no city lights. we were in the back yard about 40 feet from a barn that was roughly 40 feet tall . looking straight up with his telescope taking turns . about 100 feet in front of us were hundreds of pine trees . we were taking turns sitting one the picnic table listening to the owner of the telescope talk astronomy,  waiting for our next chance to see the planet. i myself asked what the star was on the horizon over the trees (i think it became brighter and actually caught my attention). then as they switched and his friend adjusted i noticed the light was slowly moving to the right. 
        his friend's brilliant analysis was it was a plane coming directly at us and it just looks like it was moving slowly and hovering. great hes a smart guy, but i didn't take my eyes off of it. as i was in mid sentence telling them to look it was no longer on the horizon it was right over the trees 100feet away from us moving about 5 miles an hour straight for the barn. it crossed the yard and went feet above the barn and continued by the house and out towards the road. while this was all happening they were both asking what it was as i was for whatever reason was going side by side with it saying i was leaving.  the illumination was baffling it was so bright it was hard to look at but it didn't illuminate anything at all except itself.  it didn't shine on the barn or the house, us , the trees. nothing. 
     the other mind boggling thing was how it got to us i didn't take my eyes off of it. neither did my friend and it did not accelerate there were no tracers it didn't just get bigger . it was absolutely baffling . right after the object left sight we left. my friend and i said we don't really remember saying goodbye to his friend, and we didn't even talk about it on the ride home. the next day we talked about it for hours. we were asking what time it was and what time we left and neither one of us could really even remember. we asked each other seriously did we get abducted but we don't know. the appearance of the object over the resection the horizon and the illumination was a little unnerving.
content.summary: Ascended bright light accelerated over barn

content.detailedDescription:
I was 15 years old. my mother and i we outside at 3am in the morning. it was my intent to look for ufos. 15 minutes later, i saw to the south a solid white triangular object. from the base of the train to the apex the length was about 1/3rd the length of the base. the base of the triangle was the leading edge. it moved slowly, steadily, and the was no sound. the object travelled from the south to the north. then as it arrived at a point directly over our heads then stopped. it remained there for just a few seconds. turned 90 degrees. stopped. again it remained in that position for just a few seconds. then with the same speed it traveled from the south to directly above us it travelled from there to over the western horizon (over the houses to our west).

the next day, i called the calgary planetarium asking who i should report this to. they gave me the name and number of mr. allen. i called him, and a few days later, he came to our home and took our statements. i reported the above. then i asked if anyone else had seen it. he said he had gotten two other reports: both were three sets of girls. one set saw something similar at 9pm, and then a second group of 3 girls saw it at 10pm. 

upon leaving mr. allen told me i would learn more when he found more information about it. that never happened.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Triangular object travels from south, stops above me, turns, stops, and proceeds over western horizon

content.detailedDescription: I have none, read above?
content.summary: Be labeled insane?

content.detailedDescription: I returned to my boyhood home as i often do; which is now 200 plus feet below the surface of an isolated lake. it was july 26, 2013. i began snapping photos of the lake with my camera aimed in the direction of the sun; one photo after another. i heard no airplane or other motorized air vehicle. i was focused on the landscape and not the details of the landscape. when i returned home, i began looking at the photos; probably 20 to 25 photos of the lake. i noticed that in one photo (just one) there was an object in the sky which i could not identify. i had heard that ufos often hover over bodies of water.  tonight i was watching a documentary on ufos and i remembered the photo from july of 2013 and decided to submit it for the observation of experts.  i do believe in ufos but i am not an expert to render an opinion.
content.summary: Hovering over a manmade body of water.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my wife were sitting on the back porch smoking a cigarette when we noticed a set of lights coming up above a tree line at the back of our home, i told my wife look at that those lights are just hovering above the tree, as we watched the lights just sit in one spot for what seemed like a minute, then the light shot off in the other direction and turned to the right and up in less than three seconds, we looked at each other and said that was not real, then a year later me and my son were riding down the road near our home when i looked out the drivers side window and saw an object in the sky, i told my son to look at that in the sky. we both saw it, it was not moving at all again this was just hovering, then it we in the same direction we were going, then it shot straight ahead and turned left within 3seconds and gone,,   one other time i was coming back from buying something for my boat 50 mile south of where i live, on the way back it was dark about 10.30 pm driving down the highway there was another truck to my right then with out worning a green light maybe 50 ft round split between our trucks maybe 100 ft above our heads going at a very high rate of speed, got maybe 3000 ft past us an turnd 90 degrees left and was gone, it never made a sound, all my windows were open that nite, i tried to stop an see if the other truck driver would stop too but he keep driving away,.
content.summary: Lights hovers over tree line for about a minute then leave at a high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription:
My friends and i always played on a rope swing it is over looking the illinois river , bartonvile and peoria airport. it was late around 9pm we were watching the lights about 5 miles away (below us) (creve coeur sits on a hill) i was looking at the stars and noticed a new one. about an hour passed we were getting ready to leave and the star i was looking at for ever started to descend.  i said hey hey look look and it came down about 500 feet above the river. 300 feet above us.It sat for about 5 minutes not moving looking exactly like a close star. it moved slowly the went over the horizon about 10 miles straight ahead of us. it lit up the part of the trees it went over. since then i watched that area of the sky every night or every other night i could see the "star" from my porch. every time i seen it i would sprint down there about a block away. every night it would do the same thing.
 the best experience with this object happened with about 8 of my friends i made come down to watch the "rope swing ufo".We were sitting and i kept saying watch that star they were looking at me like i was crazy.  about an hour passed and like clockwork it descended but it didn't stop at the usual height it kept coming down like it seen us or it was showing itself to us or just coincidencidently we all witnessed this time. it stopped above the river straight across from us probably an eighth of a mile or less. it didn't look like a star anymore it looked like two rows of lights with inconsyncopated lights going around it. we could see a slight rocking to it very slightly like how a helicopter would rock but it was absolutely silent. it was hard to tell if it was really rocking or if it was because we were squinting so much because it was that bright. it hovered there for 5 minutes maybe and as we were all talking.  it vanished no tracers no acceleration it didn't just turn the lights off it was gone. 
             a week went by every night i looked from my porch i didn't see the star. after band practice i went out to cool down i seen it. i yelled to my friend he came out. i took off to watch it. he didn't think it was such a big deal. finally about 45 minutes went by and it descended to the normal height. about 500 feet above the river / bartonville.  we were watching he was saying i don't know its probably something explainable but what he didn't know. then here comes an airplane not a little one a big one that can hold like 100 people it circled around the proximity where it was . the plane went above it so thats how low it was. the plane was also deafening. we seen the plane land at peoria airport. the object ascended a couple hundred feet more. we thought it was going to take off but it stayed.  we both said yep they see it and they are checking it out. 10 minutes later we see another huge plane( maybe the same one ) take off from the airport fly a ways away and circled the object. it didn't move at all we thought they were going to hit it. it really looked like the plane was circling a star. then 10 minutes later another plane. this time when the plane circled the object. the object lit up the entire back half of the plane. it was absolutely frightening. we both thought it blew up the plane. or maybe hit it. it was 10 pm or later and i know i seen the word delta on the plane. about 10 seconds after it lit the plane up. it disappeared.  i don't recall any more incidences of that particular fashion. 
   as time went on though i would always see lights coming out of the sky so bright it catches my eye looking straight ahead.  ten or so times i've seen ufos chasing planes or catching up to them and vearing off in another direction.
content.summary: Star descending below me hovering lights pulsating rocking bright silent disappearing everynight

content.detailedDescription:
Where i live there was 20 of us who saw like this guy we took out our binoculars my friend took out his hunting scope you could see it rotating thread yellow green and blue lights like circles this went on for three weeks and then vanished 

the next time i noticed strange lights was coming home from texas, white sands missile range when you go across from san antonio towards care so so we were headed west approximately 12 at night me and my wife we were in the middle of the straightaway on the bottom of the valley when these flashing lights on south side of the highway came towards us about 10 feet off the ground then they followed beside us at the same rate of speed 70 miles an hour approximately 50 yards south of us we started coming towards the road where the observatory was about a half mile before we got there it headed south and then aimed towards the military building about a half-mile off the road the buildings doors opened up the flashing lights went straight in the crazy part was three more followed right after almost instantaneously there's no way something can go that fast into a building. that was two years ago is old ford pickup on the side of the road watching it

i know i don't know what it was but if we get stuff he can fly into a building and 70 miles not come to a complete stop america's number worry about ps that isn't the only thing that happens here coming out and see for yourself
content.summary: Bright light in sky holding the same position for over three hours and then vanishing

content.detailedDescription: Was installing equipment.  saw orb directly overhead.  took picture with cellphone.  poor quality due to height.  estimated height based on aircraft passing below. this was a year and a half ago. i can get date from my office.  this was the same time as a forest fire in the area. others present.
content.summary: Directly overhead.  have picture on cellphone

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on back porch and looked over at neighbors house and there it was it looked like good year blimp no noise it was hovering just above their house there were lights on the side just, it then began to angle to about a 45 degree angle and began to move ahead slowly then there was a flash and it was gone.
content.summary: I was standing on back porch & looked at neighbors house and there it was it looked like good year blimp no noise it was hovering just above their house there were lights on the side just, it then began to angle to about a 45 degree angle and began

content.detailedDescription: I was in my living room one night, i looked out the window and saw a strange object hovering over the trees by my house.  it made no noise and it glowed.  the object was circular and as large as a car.  it was yellowish in color.  i immediately screamed.  my father was awakened and ran outside within 2 minutes to look for himself but the object was gone.  i had never been so scared in my life.  i was paralyzed with fear and that is why i was afraid to go outside to look for the object myself.
content.summary: Looked out the window at night, then i saw a large glowing object hovering above the trees.

content.detailedDescription: Out for morning walk at school track. saw overhead at high altitude.Hovered for several minutes. glowing cylinder with light beam radiating from sides. while watching we turned our backs to walk 15 feet under shade tree and it was gone. we scanned the sky and saw it down valley about 7mi. it hovered there for couple minutes then came back over us and then down to the other end of the valley where it hovered for several minutes. other people saw it and said it was nothing ever seen before we took pictures on phone and went home to see if it was on the news. could not believe no one reported it...The pictures we took need to be expanded to see object in sky.
content.summary: Saw directly overhead then down the valleyblink of eye

content.detailedDescription: My friend was driving to his home by the local airport and looked up and saw a blue orb hovering over the airport. he then took some photos with his phone and posted them to fb. he wanted to know what it was and how it was just suspended there. no noise or emissions.
content.summary: Can give u the information of the person that originally took this picture. description  of event below.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work driving in a west direction on hwy 20 i happend to look up in the sky and noticed 3 objects with a white like trail of smoke are something trailing it i took pictures on my phone and got home and told my daughter to look and she abserb it to .And it seemed to last 30min are longer so i calle are local news channel 6 and ask if anything was reported and the said no.So i ent them pictures to there email and never heard anything else.
content.summary: Thay seam to b moving slowly to the west with a white like trail like a smoke r something

content.detailedDescription:
1. driving to baseball

5. i thought it was cool and wanted to find out more about it 
6. by it speeding away
content.summary: Small cigar shaped object buzzing over streets.

content.detailedDescription:
while driving east on i-80 on 3-24-2015 at 10:10 pm right before the taylor rd exit i observed an stationary unblinking bluish light hovering to the left of freeway 1000 ft up approx. within a few seconds the object ascended smoothly and quickly towards my position. i had my phone with me but saw how it would be gone before i could take a picture. i thought about pulling over and watching it but decided against it for safety reasons. 
 at the highest altitude i saw it before leaving my sight the object looked blue on top half and white on bottom half. the bluish light appeared to coming from within the object and the white half was more like an aura that went outside of the sphere outline. i noticed a plane's lights blinking farther away (probably landing at the airport in lincoln calif.)
 i've seen large balloons rise in the sky but not as quickly as this. it appeared to be intelligently controlled. it was definitely not a rc toy that i have seen at night flying by i-5 where i live.
 i used to get real excited by sightings but this one was ordinary in comparison to others i have witnessed.
content.summary: While driving i-80 e before taylor rd i observed blue sphere first hover then ascend up and over freeway.

content.detailedDescription: I awoke one morning,  around 5am,  and went to my back deck to smoke a cigarette(we do not smoke inside).  after a couple minutes of looking to the stars,  i see 3 red lights.  while they looked solid,  they appeared as if looking through a stained glass window(blurry almost).  the lights were in triangle formation,  moving south at a fast speed. the object was moving fast enough that i was sure i would hear a noise,  typical of any known aircraft,  but no noise came.  there did not appear to be a body to the craft,  though common sense tells me there should have been one.  i could only assume it may have been cloaked in some way,  but that is only speculation.  there are no roads behind my apartment,  nor any other buildings close enough to cause any reflections.  there were no clouds in the sky at all,  nor any fog.  i have been a believer in the unknown and/or unexplained,  but i know to reason things out before coming to any conclusions or judgements.  the object and lights moved too quickly for me to take any photos,  and i do not care if anyone thinks i am crazy.  i saw what i saw.  i hope this little bit of information helps towards a full disclosure some day.
content.summary: 3 glowing but dimmed lights in triangle form within 100 yards over head
